institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
contents: Article 1 (Purpose) This rule applies to Article 6 (Project) of the Human Resources Development Service of Korea Act, Article 18 (Free Job Placement Project) of the 「Employment Stability Act」, and Article 12 (Global Talent Training Project) of the 「Special Act on Youth Employment Promotion」 The purpose is to determine the matters necessary for the Human Resources Development Service of Korea (hereinafter referred to as *Authority) to efficiently carry out the Global Job Support Project (hereinafter referred to as *Project) in accordance with the (hereinafter referred to as *Project).
